mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party_board_master (board_party_seq, board_member_seq, board_title, board_contents) VALUES (#{boardPartySeq}, #{boardMemberSeq}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents})

(#{boardSeq}, #{fileName}, current_timestamp())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM party_board_pic WHERE board_pic_board_seq = #{boardSeq} AND board_pic_file = #{fileName}
mapper.select: SELECT A.board_seq AS boardSeq, A.board_party_seq AS boardPartySeq, A.board_member_seq AS boardMemberSeq, C.user_name AS userName, A.board_title AS boardTitle, A.board_contents AS boardContents, A.board_hit AS boardHit, A.input_dt AS inputDt, A.update_dt AS updateDt FROM party_board_master A INNER JOIN party_member B ON A.board_member_seq = B.member_seq INNER JOIN user_master C ON B.member_user_seq = C.user_seq WHERE board_seq= #{boardSeq}

SELECT A.board_seq AS boardSeq, A.board_party_seq AS boardPartySeq, A.board_member_seq AS boardMemberSeq, C.user_name AS userName, A.board_title AS boardTitle, A.board_contents AS boardContents, A.board_hit AS boardHit, A.input_dt AS inputDt, A.update_dt AS updateDt FROM party_board_master A INNER JOIN party_member B ON A.board_member_seq = B.member_seq INNER JOIN user_master C ON B.member_user_seq = C.user_seq WHERE board_party_seq = #{boardPartySeq} ORDER BY board_seq DESC
